CustomField.description: Used in the banner for Do Not Prospect
CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Type,'HROi Client'),'HROi Client ','')+ IF(ISPICKVAL(Type,'SurePayroll HR'),'SurePayroll HR ','')+ IF( CONTAINS( OpportunityTypes__c , 'SurePayroll ASO'), ' SurePayroll ASO ','')+ IF( CONTAINS( OpportunityTypes__c , 'SurePayroll HRE'), ' SurePayroll HRE ','')+ IF($RecordType.Name = 'Core Referral Source Record Type','Referral Source Shell Record ','')+ IF($RecordType.Name = 'HRS Referral Source Record Type','Referral Source Shell Record ','')+ IF($RecordType.Name = 'Referral Account Record Type','Referral Source Shell Record ','')+ IF(OR(Service_Model_Type__c='NCO',Service_Model_Type__c='New Client Onboarding',ISPICKVAL(Client_Onboarding_Status__c,'In Progress'),!ISBLANK(Current_Implementation_Type__c)),'Currently in Implementation ','')+ IF(ISPICKVAL(Permanent_Hold_Out_Description__c,'Ecommerce'),'Ecommerce ','')+ IF(ISPICKVAL(Permanent_Hold_Out_Description__c,'Surepayroll ERTC'),'Surepayroll ERTC ','')+ IF(ISPICKVAL(Restricted_Industry__c,'CRB'),'CRB ','')+ IF( CONTAINS( SensitivityList__c , 'ERTC'),'ERTC ','')+ IF( CONTAINS( Lead_List__c , 'MM1'),'Acquisition ','')
CustomField.label: Do Not Prospect Reason
